entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 09 January 2023
